introduction: A young woman traveling alone through Eastern Europe and carrying nothing but her bviolin.She awakens one morning in a train station in Budapest . She is penniless,alone and ready to give up on her travels,but without enough money to buy ticket home she is trapped in the station.She plays her violin to the passersby for money,but no one stops to listen except for one person,a curious little girl,who has no money to offer ,but whose modest donation has an invaluable effect on the Violinist.
